mapper.select: SELECT a.session_id, a.name, a.avatar_url, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM base_im_session_content b WHERE b.session_id = a.session_id AND b.create_ts > a.last_open_ts) AS unReadCount FROM base_im_session_ref_user a LEFT JOIN base_im_session b ON b.id = a.session_id WHERE a.show_flag = TRUE ORDER BY b.last_receive_ts DESC
